## NumberLiterals type

Helper type to convert number array into array of [INumberLiteralType](./tscgen.inumberliteraltype.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NumberLiterals<T extends Readonly<number[]>> = {
    [P in keyof T]: T[P] extends number ? INumberLiteralType<T[P]> : never;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [INumberLiteralType](./tscgen.inumberliteraltype.md)
